scripts.jsonlint: jsonlint package.json 1> /dev/null && for file in example/config/*.json; do jsonlint $file 1> /dev/null; if [ $? != 0 ]; then exit 1; fi; done
scripts.test: exit 0; npm run jsonlint && cd example; NODE_ENV=test mocha ../test/cases/*.js
scripts.test-ci: npm run jsonlint && cd example; NODE_ENV=test mocha --reporter xunit-file ../test/cases/*.js
scripts.test-coverage: rm -rf cobertura-coverage.xml html-report; istanbul instrument src/ -o lib-cov && cd example/; ISTANBUL_REPORTERS=html,text-summary,cobertura NODE_ENV=test-cov mocha -R mocha-istanbul ../test/cases/*.js; mv cobertura-coverage.xml html-report ..
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production PORT=4100 pm2 start index.js -i 0 --name os
scripts.start-uat: NODE_APP_INSTANCE=uat NODE_ENV=production PORT=4100 pm2 start index.js -i 2 --name os
scripts.delete: pm2 stop os && pm2 delete os
scripts.build: echo 'nothing to do here for oauth2' && exit 0
